PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-08542004-07-20,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act
PrecisOrder (a) transferring the control and supervision of the PUBLIC SERVICE HUMAN RESOURCES MANAGEMENT AGENCY OF CANADA from the President of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada to the PRESIDENT OF THE TREASURY BOARD; and (b) directing that he or she shall preside over it; effective July 20, 2004.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2004-0090 Publication Date: 2004-08-11
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act
precis: Order (a) transferring  the control and supervision of the PUBLIC SERVICE HUMAN RESOURCES MANAGEMENT AGENCY OF CANADA from the President of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada to the PRESIDENT OF THE TREASURY BOARD; and (b) directing that he or she shall preside over it; effective July 20, 2004.
